resources.string: -> Foodies Delivery Partners are independent contractors, who are required to pick up food or grocery items ordered by customers from restaurants / outlets and deliver to customers. Delivery Partners use their own vehicles (Bike/Cycle) to deliver orders to Foodies customers.
-> Delivery fees varies from city to city and is applicable on your delivery location distance from our pick-up station. Standard charges apply
Q3.Can I place an order on call?
->Yes, we accept orders on call. You can call us on +91-XXXXXXXXXX for placing your orders.
Q4.How do I know my order is confirmed?
-> We will send you a order confirmation email once we receive your order.
Q5.Can I change the address once the order has been placed?

-> Yes, you can ask for a change in the delivery address if our supplier hasnâ€™t already dispatched the order. Please call on +91-XXXXXXXXXX or writing to our customer support assist mentioning your Order details.
